item.description:
'Tis a special Monday event to help bring in the FALL SEASON. Join us Monday, Oct 15th, for a special "Smash the Pumpkin" event in conjunction with the usual Geeks Who Drink pub quiz!

The usual pub quiz starts at 7:00pm join us and Geeks Who Drink http://geekswhodrink.com/518/ .  The quiz consists of 8 rounds of 8 questions and includes a picture round, music round, and chances for FREE BEER! Come early to get a good seat and a good team. ;)

IN ADDITION:

  Smash The Pumpkin Monday!!

Prizes:

Everyone who ordered a pint of the Red Hook Pumpkin beer gets a take home pint glass ($6 per pint limit 1 glass per guest).

First prize team gets 4-5 tickets (quantity TBD by team max #) for a VIP tour of the brewery in NH and lunch.

All trivia participants will be given swag (t-shirts, hats, keychains ect).  Redhook will also be giving away gratis pints to people who are already drinking pumpkin.  The person who kicks each keg (aka smashes the pumpkin) gets to keep the handle. 

MORE PRIZES AND GIVEAWAYS TO BE ANNOUNCED!

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District near State Street (Orange and Blue Line), Downtown Crossing (Orange and Red Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Red and Green Lines).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink.  PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB.  You can view Battery Park's menu here: http://www.batteryparkboston.com/.

Hope to see you there!!

 

NOTE:  I will be on my way out of town, but Maria from Social Fun has graciously offered to host while I'm away! Just look for fellow members from their pics or ask bartender/hostess for the MeetUp group.
item.how_to_find_us: Maria from Social Fun is hosting this event. Ask bartender or hostess if you cannot find the group.
item.name: SMASH THE PUMPKIN MONDAY with Pub Quiz with Geeks Who Drink at Battery Park
